description.value:
Prerequisite: 11th level, warlock, star pact

Benefit: When you have a bonus from the Fate of the Void pact boon, you can apply it to all your defenses as an immediate interrupt when an enemy hits you. When you do, it lasts until the triggering attack is resolved, and then the bonus is spent.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381, page(s) 53.
